website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a pleasing scent as it cleans the bowl each time you flush.
pros: Hangs inside the bowl, rather than inside the tank, so it's pretty easy to install
Has both deodorizing capabilities and the ability to eliminate bacteria
Should keep the bowl cleaner since it hangs inside
cons: Costlier than some other options, especially since it lasts about 4 weeks

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really work, didn't love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too impressed with these. The smell doesn't really smell like cleaner but more like a cheap stick of deodorant. Almost like walking into a Jr High locker room. After a few weeks on the toilet, the spot where it's actually touching the inside of the toilet bowl and directly below it were stained blue. After tossing these, I was able to scrub most of it off but not completely. Hopefully over the next few weeks, the rest will disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Smell terrible defeating the whole purpose of purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Smells like urinal cakes in public bathrooms. If you like that smell, this is the product for you. Since I opened and tried the product, too late to return but never purchasing this again. After reading reviews, most products either stain, small of bleach or urinal cakes and other negative reviews. Not saying this is any worse, just that I decided best to just clean often and not bother with these "easy" products as they all have a downside, in this case the odor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Mostly I just wanted a fresh smell from the toilet bowl but I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: These cleaners do not even touch the water in my bowl. The cleaners do not fit snug to the toilet bowl, therefore NO scent and no cleaning. The water just runs behind the insert. Mostly I just wanted a fresh smell from the toilet bowl but I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Good product, hard to find
customer_reviews.text: I have used these hanging toilet cleaning tablets for several years. Hanging in the bowl so they don't damage rubber items in the tank, they are the best solution for us, as the problem is in the bowl, anyway. However, 1)they are very difficult to find (used to get them at Costco), 2) they have gotten softer so sometimes prematurely disintegrate, which makes them even more expensive, 3)they have changed the shape which does not impress me, 4)can't find them in the 6-8 pak anymore, 5) many times not even available through Amazon, annoys me!
customer_reviews.author: happy in nevada

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, keeps things clean and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Friend commented recently about the nice smell in my bathroom - it was a day or two after I put a new cleaner tablet. These things do a good job keeping the bowl clean and prevent the forming of a water residue - you definitely can go longer between scrubbing sessions. You need to pay attention where you hang the thing to regulate how much of the soap it releases. It is very easy to hang, very easy to move around the bowl. Second time I am getting this cleaner value pack, my friend is now hooked as well and will also definitely keep buying and using this.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina Koinova

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing, but still pretty mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It's beneficial to have this hang on your toilet. But that doesn't change the fact that it's a mediocre product. Does NOT clean your toilet at all. With each flush, barely any of the tablet goes down with it, if at all sometimes. It ends up just making a stain like mess inside your toilet that you'll have to wipe off with a wet wipe. The only real benefit was that it's cheap, easy to install, and helps a bit with the poo poo fragrances. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: InternetGeek

customer_reviews.title: Just do not fit toilet rim!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tabs which are supposed to hold this cleaning device against the inside of the toilet rim are too soft and pliable. They do not hold the device where it needs to be. They are woefully inadequate. I will be searching for the old fashioned kind with metal tabs. This was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: AUNT BUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Warning - this product caused a problem
customer_reviews.text: When the cake dissolved the clip that held it fell into my toilet without me knowing and was flushed and lodged into the plumbing, I had to have a plumber , at $120 a hour, come in and augur it out. How lousy of a design that would let this happen !? There was no warning of fitting to lid, etc.
customer_reviews.author: marlene harvis

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling bar without being overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling bar without being overwhelming. I live alone and each bar lasts me about 3 months until fully disintegrated. The strongest smell drops off at the second month with just enough to make it an extra month. I've tried the gels & didn't care for the smell, this ocean scent is my favorite. As a guy, I didn't want a floral smelling bathroom, this seems to me to be a little masculine and fresh scent without being powdery.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Freshness
customer_reviews.text: This item is very nice. The best thing to do is flush your toilet to see where the water flow starts when flushing. Best to put the item under that spot. The fragrance is very strong at first and then it balances, but love how it fills the room with a clean smell. Definitely going to reorder again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C Callen

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I know how to sew!!
customer_reviews.text: I really should have known better. The price was too good to be true. The fabric is just OK. The workmanship not so OK. The hem on one of the pillow cases is completely undone and needs to be sewn. I have the wherewithal to fix this problem but why should I have to??? Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Granger

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest. Short lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I used them for three of my bathrooms. It's easy to use. It smelled great and was fine for the first two weeks but then it dissolved too much that it dropped into the toilet for two of them. One is still hanging in there but the scent is not as strong. It's a hit or miss with the lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: parksee

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: We buy those often and will continue to do so - smells great, works even better! You can't lose with this purchase. We moved into a house that had them and I had never even knew about them and its a done deal - Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McClure

customer_reviews.title: Wish our toilet was configured differently.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and keeps the bowl cleaner than without it. However, the bowl fills from the front and putting the cleaner right in front doesn't work well for us.
customer_reviews.author: barrel

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, not great design
customer_reviews.text: These smell really nice but the plastic handle does not sit right on either of my toilets which looks shabby and they leave a blue streak after the tiolet has been flushed.
customer_reviews.author: K. VanDuser

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Once the bar is gone, its easy to replace with another one
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work as well as others, which are much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: James E. deMin

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Good idea to have it, as it does the job of minimizing (not eliminating) toilet mildew Still need to be aware that the toilet still needs a manual scrub at leaat once a month
customer_reviews.author: e2015

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, smell nice...I don't use any other now, really love how good it works
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Scent is a bit heavy at first but it really cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Javagoddess

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep my toilet clean without scrubbing, but does keep mold at bay for longer! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to attach to bowl and leaves a long streak of blue gunk other than that it does the job nicely
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming smell
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it long enough to see how effective it is, but its smell is so bad it gives me headache and I am afraid that it will make other stuff smell like it if I store this with them. Just because how overwhelmingly smelly it is, I won't purchase again. Doesn't matter if it does keep rings away.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kim

customer_reviews.title: product that keeps on cleaning
customer_reviews.text: been using product for over 1 year, without any problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bowl cleaner
customer_reviews.text: These keep my toilets very clean and do not erode the rubber and seals as an inside the toilet product can/does do. You just have to keep the lid down if you have pets that drink from your toilet - maybe it won't kill them, but why take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: KL Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Pass!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work and is unsightly when it starts to fall apart. Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Sue

customer_reviews.title: Lysol
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good no mess toliet cleaner that WORKS & is VERY GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Eileene H. Short

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: It makes your toilet smells good and fresh. If only there were more foam on the flush, I will love more.
customer_reviews.author: JOY

customer_reviews.title: otherwise very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: works very well, no residue inside the bowl, it does have a strong fresh scent that does not bother me but could be an issue to a sensitive or allergy prone person. otherwise very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Elina Fogelson

customer_reviews.title: Helped with the stale odor coming from my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I had this faint odor coming from my bathroom. It wasn't a pee or dirty smell but it was literally the old toilet I assume since I have my place professionally cleaned. This definitely worked to "clear the air"
customer_reviews.author: Brad M

customer_reviews.title: great scent nasty stains
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times. The scent is wonderful. This time it left a thick gunky stain that was hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Lam

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: These smell great! They do a good job of minimizing toilet rings and they really freshen up the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: randee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my best household purchases yet. It works as promised. What else do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: EwBAR

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the expectations
customer_reviews.text: Scent smell never last long . Its easy to use but because of its thivkness , i am not liking it . I will not recommend this .
customer_reviews.author: Thumu ranjith kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great clean and scent
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Easy to use, nice smell. Will be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Multipack comes in handy so I don’t have to keep making store runs for it
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Haigler

customer_reviews.title: Getting this product in bulk at anaffordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I like having the opportunity of getting this product in bulk at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tonetta Morris-Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient and they keep your toilet smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford K. Talamon

customer_reviews.title: It works and smells nice too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, long-lasting toilet cleaning product that fills the bathroom with a pleasant, fresh fragrance too!
customer_reviews.author: Silly1

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Its OK. The smell from it is kind of strong but I should have known because it is a Lysol product.
customer_reviews.author: Chella

customer_reviews.title: Will try something else next time
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep scum rings out of the toilet bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Hedwall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These
customer_reviews.text: Great mild aroma.They don't clean so I use them as a deodorizer.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and as described. Good product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and seems to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: good cost. cleanliness is next to etc
customer_reviews.text: does the job. good cost. cleanliness is next to etc. and should always be at play in the b/r.
customer_reviews.author: johnny suede

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: The hanger length is too short to get close to the water stream. I haven't seen any positive results after 3 weeks of use/
customer_reviews.author: ARJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is not the same as the one on the photo. I won’t order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Prevents ring stains, but not streak stains
customer_reviews.text: This product will prevent the water sitting in the bowl from leaving a ring stain where the water meets the bowl. But what still remains is the water streaks where the water enters the toilet. This means you still need to find a solution where you probably need to insert tablets or some kind of mechanism in the toilet tank to prevent those stains from appearing.
customer_reviews.author: Takao Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It says up to 24 weeks on the package....Smell was gone in a couple of days, product was gone in less than a week. Kinda a waste of money at about $ 2.50 a shot. IMHO
customer_reviews.author: L. T.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product but
customer_reviews.text: I rated this item with a three star review because of it'so price. In other words, I found at another vender for a much lower price ( one two pack for $2.99) whereas the six pack I purchased was > $12. So then my rating is about price only as, I really like the product but, my next purchase will be from the other vender.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Literally does not work. Tried several of them, in different toilets. No difference with it on or off- it does not work. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ab. M.S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT a cleaner--It maintains--smell dissapates after a week
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call it a "cleaner" really. It won't get rid of gunk around your toilet if you already have some. It's more of a "maintainer"! There is a nice smell which goes away after a week or so, and it does help keep weird stuff from building up. I disagree with the pricing as well. It is entirely too high for a sub-par- cheap to make product.
customer_reviews.author: HardyHar

customer_reviews.title: It says no mess. But, it did nothing but leave huge streaks of blue down the side of my toilet.
customer_reviews.text: It says no mess. But, it did nothing but leave huge streaks of blue down the side of my toilet. So now I'm cleaning my toilet more than I've had to before.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holland

customer_reviews.title: Lysol Clearner
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lysol No Mess Toilet Cleaners because we are moving and a couple of the house restrooms were not being used. So once a week I flush the toilets not being used and the toilets are clean and the scent is fresh in the bathroom. No mess and no worries.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Lasts 3 - 4 months with two people. It does break up and fall off at the end but I have never had any problem with flushing it down. Keeps toilet clean and smells fresh. Does leave a blue mark in the bowl underneath where it hangs .
customer_reviews.author: peachy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THAN EXPECTED THESE OUTSTANDING LYSOL TOILET BOWL CLEANERS CLEAN AND DEODORIZE WITHOUT DOING A THING FOR WEEKS this toad like lavender still cleaning and deodorizing 3 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: CARMINE RICCA JR

customer_reviews.title: Was Gone in Less than 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This product did not last more than 2 weeks; maybe less, but checked on it after 2 weeks. GONE. Both toilets. 1 person household.
customer_reviews.author: TooOldToRunTina

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet deodorizers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these toilet deodorizers. Easy and last for a decent number of days. Not easy to find in local drugstores. Glad to see them here.
customer_reviews.author: Java Sam

customer_reviews.title: Smelling good toilet deoderizers
customer_reviews.text: This toilet deodorizer smells really nice. Arrived late but as described (postal service issues). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: scopin4u2Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - just clip on edge of toilet bowl
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for years. They work well and last what feels like a reasonable time.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Priced right
customer_reviews.text: Works great nice scent and keeps the toilet clean Priced right too
customer_reviews.author: scott gould

customer_reviews.title: So simple!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and the way it helps keep the bowl clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joann C. Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and cleans the water rust in toilet. Good Price also.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Rodenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great to buy in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: Direst package to buy in bulk! Wish they had fastest shipping!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mary

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I love the was it makes my toilet bowl smell!
customer_reviews.author: Letron Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit an elongated bowl as well as a round bowl. The flush water holes do not get close enough to do much good
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Glover

customer_reviews.title: LYSOL BOWL CLEANER WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: LYSOL BOWL CLEANER KEEPS MY TOILET CLEAN & SMELLING GREAT
customer_reviews.author: PETER BUCARIA

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these all the time from the grocery store, I have also purchased them from Cosco with Excellent results! However these are dissolving quite quickly in the toilet and making one big mess, maybe they were sitting somewhere in a warehouse for a long period of time . I would not recommend anyone to order these , as my sister has had the same problem with these. I would return but not worth the effort, I will go back to purchasing them in the grocery store in the future. I would not give it one star if I didn't have to. :(
customer_reviews.author: Syndel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These do not work as well as the original clorox ones. These stain the toilet behind the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Good to Have
customer_reviews.text: This is the second batch I've purchased, because I like the way they keep the toilet bowl clean and pleasant smelling between cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: O.C. Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Useless Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really keep toilet bowl clean. It only helps a little, like 10% to keep it from stinking. almost useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikunj

product_meta.title: Lysol No Mess Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner Value Pack, Ocean Fresh scent, 6 Count
feature_bullets: Freshens and cleans for up to 4 weeks^Cleans^Contains antimicrobial protection in the hook to resist odor-causing bacteria^Thick strong wipe is great for cleaning up messes

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
